thread.title: Get Ready for the Ipswitch Innovate 2015 Virtual User Summit October 21 and 22
thread.title_full: Get Ready for the Ipswitch Innovate 2015 Virtual User Summit October 21 and 22

author: admin
title: Get Ready for the Ipswitch Innovate 2015 Virtual User Summit October 21 and 22
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/15/2015 @ 7:58 AM   Ipswitch 
LEXINGTON, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Mark your calendars to attend our two-day, free online event on October 21 and 22 that will bring together IT professionals and industry experts to share their IT challenges and innovative approaches to solving them. 
“ Ipswitch Innovate will bring together over 2,000 customers, partners and industry experts to learn, interact and innovate,” said Jeff Loeb, CMO at Ipswitch. “Attendees will hear about trends and best practices for managing the internet of things and security from industry experts, best practices and tips from IT pros, and innovations from Ipswitch product gurus”. 
Top Ten Reasons to Register and Attend Ipswitch Innovate 2015 Get three hours of information-packed content per day , for free. Register to attend by midnight US PT today and enter promo code “PWATCH” for a chance to win a Pebble smartwatch Advance your techniques with expert advice on how to get IT done better, faster, cheaper Bear witness to battle stories from the trenches where IT pros will share their best practices for solving their most challenging IT problems Hear what THINKstrategies founder Jeff Kaplan says your IT team should do now to prepare for the Internet of Things (IoT) that’s shaping our high-bandwidth future Pick up smart tips from cybersecurity expert David Lacey for building a secure, compliant file transfer system – from standards to the trends driving information security forward Get early insight into what’s ahead for Ipswitch products , and interact with solutions engineers and product managers to answer questions Earn Ipswitch Rewards , real money that can be spent this year on Ipswitch products Celebrate innovation at the Ipswitch Customer Awards ceremony that honors the most creative use of Ipswitch products Attend the virtual exhibit hall where you can evaluate network monitoring and data transfer solutions like WhatsUp Gold , WS_FTP and MOVEit . You can even saddle up to our own genius bar for real-time answers to your product questions Attend in your pajamas, because there’s no dress code at a virtual event 
In related news, Ipswitch today announced new data that reveals top challenges for IT teams heading into 2016, that includes a free copy of the report entitled “ 8 Issues Derailing IT Team Innovation: Key Challenges Facing IT Teams in 2016 ”. 
For more information on Ipswitch Innovate 2015 Online Summit (October 21-22, 2015) including how to register for this free event, visit: www.ipswitch.com/Innovate . 
About Ipswitch Ipswitch helps solve complex IT problems with simple solutions. The company’s software has been installed on more than 150,000 networks spanning 168 countries to monitor networks, applications and servers, and securely transfer files between systems, business partners and customers. Ipswitch was founded in 1991 and is based in Lexington, Massachusetts with offices throughout the U.S., Europe, Asia and Latin America. For more information, visit www.ipswitch.com . Ipswitch, WhatsUp Gold, WS_FTP and MOVEit are registered trademarks of Ipswitch, Inc. in the U.S. and other countries.
